text: Need Daniel Martinez for Amart Furniture campaign. Budget around $2,116, looking for 3 x Social media takeover, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x YouTube video, 2 x LinkedIn post, 1 x LinkedIn post. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
